parameters: You're just the one I trust the most.
\pop[2]I'm a bit relieved at his reassurance.
\pop[3]But I still feel bad for tricking everyone else...
\pop[3]Look. I've been playing a careful game for a while, now.
What to say - when to say it. Fun stuff like that.
\pop[3]It was clear that I had to stop holding everything back.
\pop[3]Still got a few cards close to my chest, though.
\pop[3]I'm pretty sure I talked to you about this at the party.
You know, how you might learn some more stuff...?
\pop[3]I guess that time has come. As much as I wish it hadn't.
Everything in the town square really changed up my plans...
\pop[3]Actually, I can't talk about that right now.
You'll have to stay on the same page as everybody else.
\i[3]"What did you want to tell me, then?"
\i[3]"What did you want to tell me, then?"
\pop[3]I'm trying to figure out how to word it.
Right now, everything I say is \c[14]extra\c[0] important.
\pop[3]I wish there was a way to tell you \c[14]without\c[0] telling you.
\pop[2]I guess this is my time for some questions, then.
\i[3]"Did you really look at footage of The Wayfarer?"
\i[3]"Did you really look at footage of The Wayfarer?"
I'm sorry, Delta. I don't know what to tell you.
\i[3]"Are you sure the footage couldn't have been edited?"
\i[3]"Are you sure the footage couldn't have been edited?"
\pop[3]Even \c[10]Argus\c[0] has to stay within the lines.
It's their tech, but we still have our rights.
\pop[3]I can't imagine they'd edit a minute of footage from some random tavern.
The owner doesn't deserve to have their own security tampered with.
\i[3]"I bumped into someone there. Right after I saw the Agent."
\i[3]"I bumped into someone there. Right after I saw the Agent."
\pop[3]Didn't see that. Again, I'm not sure what to say.
I just saw you pick up the wallet, and leave.
\i[3]"I saw them at the party, too."
\i[3]"I saw them at the party, too."
I would \c[14]never\c[0] let somebody like that into my house.
\i[3]"Didn't you take the security off the back door?"
\i[3]"Didn't you take the security off the back door?"
\i[3]"They could've snuck in that way, then."
\i[3]"They could've snuck in that way, then."
From what I can tell, my misdirection worked fine...
\pop[3]That report, on the TV at work.
I was certain they fell for it.
\pop[3]It was spoofed, so it'd appear like it was live.
\pop[3]I even used a voice changer, and "slipped up" on purpose.
Like... a few hints about where it was being broadcast from.
\pop[3]It was a trick, so \c[10]Argus\c[0] \c[14]thought\c[0] they knew where our HQ was.
Then, I could take everybody into the safety of my own home.
\pop[3]After the party, we planned to stay safe in the con crowd.
Delta, I'm sorry, but what you're saying? It doesn't make sense.
\pop[3]Yeah. Well, except for you and the main group.
I needed a safe place to hide while \c[10]Argus\c[0] took the bait.
And you say there was an agent in my house?
It wouldn't be just \c[14]one\c[0] agent. It'd be a swarm. A takedown.
\pop[2]He stops to think, clearly a little annoyed at the situation.
\pop[2]I'm just baffled at what he's telling me.
\pop[2]\c[14]He\c[0] gave \c[10]Argus\c[0] the ultimatum that led to the midnight deaths?
\pop[2]The more I think about it, the more everything starts to make sense.
\pop[2]Isaac seemed to know everyone at the party, but never mentioned them before.
\pop[2]They only mingled with Isaac, and he was handing off briefcases to them.
\pop[2]He \c[14]made\c[0] it, and that means Kyron has been a test run all along.
\pop[2]We're even more involved than I thought we were. It's all been Isaac...
\pop[2]He places his hands on my shoulders, and looks me right in the eyes.
\pop[3]You \c[14]know\c[0] what I'm trying to tell you, right?
I can trust that this isn't going over your head?
\pop[2]A vocal admission that he's \c[23]Hermes\c[0] could go very wrong, very fast.
\pop[2]Especially if \c[10]Argus\c[0] was listening in, like I feared they might be.
\pop[2]He removes his hands from my shoulders, and smiles.
And there's only a few more days to go.
It's time to bring things to an end.
\pop[2]I guess I don't really have a say in the matter.
\pop[2]If I left, he couldn't guarantee my safety.
\pop[2]And, just like he says, I \c[14]have\c[0] been safe at his side.
\pop[2]My trust and faith in him continues to be rewarded.
\pop[2]This is still a lot to take in. Both his hidden identity, and the \c[10]Argus\c[0] agent.
\pop[2]It feels like there's something missing, here. One \c[14]vital\c[0] piece of the puzzle.
\pop[2]Or maybe I'm just telling that to myself to make the coping easier...
\pop[2]Either way, I request some private time. I need a few minutes to think.
I'll just chill with the others in the hallway.
I should probably see how they're doing, anyway.
\pop[2]He smiles, and leaves the room almost immediately.
\pop[2]I can hear the chatter commence, but I can't make out any words.
\pop[2]It's for the best, though. This was time for me to focus on my \c[14]own\c[0] thoughts.
